talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Headquarters Guard$
This is free neutral city-state Merca. Welcome, traveller.

$Headquarters Guard$
Some guards idolise and wish to join the Army of Destruction but I'm proud of my job as a Headquarters Guard helping the travellers.

$Headquarters Guard$
You want to know the difference between the normal guards and the Headquarters Guards?
Headquarters Guards are those who ensure the safety of the President and follow his orders. Maybe I should add that we're of a higher rank than the other guards too. Hahaha.

$Headquarters Guard$
There are all kinds of people in Merca but the guards are mostly chosen from the indigenous inhabitants of Merca. That's because we're the ones who know and love Merca the most.
